name: BNNS.EmbeddingLayer
desc: A layer object that wraps an embedding filter and manages its deinitialization.

items.name: init?(input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, dictionary: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, paddingIndex: Int, maximumNorm: Float, normType: BNNS.Norm, scalesGradientByFrequency: Bool, filterParameters: BNNSFilterParameters?)
func apply(batchSize: Int, input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Applies the layer to a set of input objects, writing the result to a set of output objects.

items.name: func applyBackward(batchSize: Int, input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, outputGradient: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, generatingWeightsGradient: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Applies the layer backward to generate input gradients.
